item.title: pwn.college embryoasm writeups
item.description:
level 6 - level 23 level 6 from pwn import * context(os='linux', arch='amd64') p = process('./embryoasm_level6') p.recvuntil(b'bytes): 
') p.send(asm('movb al, dil
movw bx, si')) p.interactive() level 7 from pwn import * context(os='linux', arch='amd64') p = process('./embryoasm_level7') p.recvuntil(b'bytes): 
') p.send(asm('shr rdi, 24
movb al, dil')) p.interactive() level 8 from pwn import * context(os='linux', arch='amd64') p = process('./embryoasm_level8') p.recvuntil(b'bytes): 
') p.send(asm('and rdi, rsi
xor rax, rax
or rax, rdi')) p.interactive() level 9 from pwn import * context(os='linux', arch='amd64') p = process('.

item.title: pwn.college embryoio writeups
item.description: 已完成：level 7 - level 59 level7 launch this program with 0 environment variables env -i command level8 non-interactive shell hacker@embryoio_level8:~$ bash tmp.sh hB [INFO] This challenge will now perform a bunch of checks. [INFO] If you pass these checks, you will receive the flag. [TEST] Performing checks on the parent process of this process. [TEST] Checking to make sure the process is a non-interactive shell script. [GOOD] You have passed the checks on the parent process!
